Text: My lord and I are out to acquire some supplies.

Sorry to have kept you waiting, my lord. Here is
everything we need.

Wait, Gamma. Referring to me as "my lord" in public
will draw attention to us.
Ah, you're right...

Of course... Our slime bodysuits would make us stand
out, so my lord is in his temporary form as Cid.
So, Mister...Cid? I...I...

Um, sorry. My mistake. You can call me "my lord",
just say it quietly.
I thank you for your consideration...

(I can speak normally to everyone except my lord
and Lady Alpha...)

By the way, what do you think is going on over there?
It's pretty noisy.
Oh, there is a festival today.
Really? I didn't know that.

While some may call it a festival, it's actually a
birthday party for a local celebrity. Since it's not
common knowledge, I can understand why you
didn't know.
A festival, huh...

(What fun it would be...to enjoy a festival with
my lord.)

W-Well...if it's not too much to ask, would you like
to go view the festival together?

(I wish I could be as well-spoken as Epsilon, but I'm
doing the best I can.)
(I'll never know unless I ask...)
Sure, okay.

Well, considering how busy you are, it's only
natural...
R-Really?!

Yeah, I'm curious myself. I want to see what the
festivals here are like.

(Oh, divine being...if you're out there, thank you
so much!)

(I thank you for arranging the festival on a day that
we happened to go shopping, and that we can see
it together...!)

Let's go check it out. It looks like that plaza is
the center of it.
Y-Yes, my lord!
It sure is crowded.
Hm? Oh yeah, Gamma...
H-Help me!! Aahhh!!!

(A-At this rate, I'll be separated...from my lord!
I'll lose...sight of him! )

(After managing to come to this festival together...
That is...the one thing...I can't allow to happen!)
H-Hey, wait! Gamma! Cling on to that fence!
O-O-Okay!! What the...?!

*huff, huff* I'm...saved. These crowds can sure be
dangerous...
Yeah... Here, wipe the blood off your nose.

But my lord, I can't stain your handkerchief with my
blood...
Hey, that's what handkerchiefs are for.
I'm o-okay, it's not too bad... I'm a tough girl.

Even with a crowd this big, I never thought you'd be
swept away by all these people.
It was a sight to see...

Hehehe, I am honored you would call such a thing...
a "sight to see."
What...?
It's dangerous if we get separated. Take my hand.
Hold...hands?

Considering all the people here, I think that
holding hands is also better for your
balance...
Huh...?! Y-You want to...hold hands?!

Rather, I am grateful for your offer. But, I do not
wish to make your hand filthy, my lord... Um...
A-Anyway, don't worry about me! Now, let's get going!
Fine. Ladies first, then.
Huh? I take the lead?
Yeah, I just said "ladies first."

I can't do such a thing! Even if it's at your
request...
Okay, fine. Do you want to take a break?
Sure, so how about...

The hill across the plaza? It's almost evening, and
the breeze should also feel nice.
Sure, that's a good idea. Let's do that.
Do you mind going first, Gamma?
Ah, of course. Understood.
(Wow, the view here is nicer than I thought!)
(Now I just have to wait for my lord...)
I'm back.
Welcome back, my lord. Where did you go?
I just bought these. Ta-dah!
My lord has all kinds of fireworks in his hands.
Oh, my...! There are so many!

It'd be boring if we just stood around and did
nothing.

I'm sorry for making you worry. I never thought that
such a crowd could sweep me away...

Oh, don't worry about that. At least we got to check
out the festival while we were shopping.

Seeing that my lord was able to satisfy his curiosity
is enough to make me feel better, but...

Aren't fireworks expensive? The shopkeepers love to
raise the prices during times like these.

It's fine. I've got pocket money for times like
these.
Okay, here goes. I'll light the first one!

My lord lights off the fireworks as if he's still
enjoying the festival, while I rest.

The fireworks fly off into the air with a
fizzling sound.
Go! Go!
Whoa...!

Along with my lord's encouragement, the fireworks
bloomed large, violet flowers in the night sky.
Yea, this is great. Festivals mean fireworks...!
Hehe, is that so? I didn't know that.

My lord's words echo within my heart. Could his
charisma be related to his power of persuasion?

I shall forever remember the fireworks that my lord
showed me.

We neither hold hands as we walk side by side,
nor do I lead the way.

Just like the violet lights in the night sky, I wish
to look up to him and follow him.
This is how I truly feel.
